name: NETJETS ASSOCIATION OF SHARED AIRCRAFT PILOTS
sampleDescriptions: Lobbied in support of a Section 618 of HR 2997, the 21st Century AIRR Act, to modernize rest and duty rules for pilots operating in Part 135/91k. Lobbied for the inclusion of language to modernize res
